pattern: Successful execution with empty execution_results array
evidence: Trace 7ef51d46 shows outcome:success but execution_results is empty, suggesting auto-capture may not have recorded test details
recommendation: Verify auto-capture hooks are properly recording test execution details, not just outcome status

pattern: Success traces provide limited learning signal
evidence: Single successful trace with no errors, no discovered issues, and no execution details to analyze
recommendation: Success traces should be logged for completeness but prioritize learning from failure traces with detailed error context

pattern: Auto-captured test runs may complete without detailed metrics
evidence: Task description 'Auto-captured test run' completed successfully but lacks test count, duration, or pass/fail breakdown
recommendation: Enhance auto-capture to include test metrics (total tests, passed, failed, duration) even on success
